summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2545 for the improvement of Thirty-third Avenue, from East Pine Street to the North line of East Howell Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with asphalt or other suitable material laid upon a proper foundation, under Ordinance No. 29527, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
